hypothesis: Baseline performance measurement using original airbench94 configuration
modification: None - using original airbench94.py without modifications
description: This is the baseline experiment to establish performance benchmarks. We use the default airbench94 hyperparameters to train a VGG-style model on CIFAR-10. Results from this experiment will serve as the reference point for evaluating modifications.

hyperparameters.note: These are the default airbench94 hyperparameters. They can be overridden by setting them at the top level of this config.

expected_results.note: Based on airbench94 paper, we expect ~94% accuracy in ~3.8 seconds on A100

notes: This baseline uses all the optimizations from the airbench94 paper:
Run this first to establish your baseline before testing modifications.
